description: Airing Friday, December 26, 2014: First up, a conversation with Michael Pacter about the new Samsung and Sony deal. And we talk to Jonathan Zittrain about a recent Internet Monitor report that says 2015 is going to be a big year for technology and policy. We'll also revisit one of our favorite Silicon Tally’s from 2014, with Marketplace's Sabri Ben-Achour.
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, December 26, 2014
teaser: Airing Friday, December 26, 2014: First up, a conversation with Michael Pacter about the new Samsung and Sony deal.
